dcterms:creator: B. C. Haller
P. W. Messer
dcterms:description: SLiM v3.1 is a simulation framework that allows for forward genetic simulations beyond the traditional Wright-Fisher model, enabling the exploration of complex evolutionary scenarios.
dcterms:title: SLiM v3.1

dcterms:creator: B. C. Haller
J. Galloway
J. Kelleher
P. W. Messer
P. L. Ralph
dcterms:description: Tree sequence recording in SLiM allows for the simulation of whole genomes and the recording of genealogical histories, providing insights into genetic relatedness and genealogical relationships.
dcterms:title: Tree sequence recording in SLiM

dcterms:creator: D. Petkova
J. Novembre
M. Stephens
dcterms:description: EEMS provides a visualization of spatial population structure by estimating effective migration surfaces, allowing researchers to understand how populations are connected across landscapes.
dcterms:title: EEMS (Estimated Effective Migration Surfaces)

dcterms:creator: H. Al-Asadi
D. Petkova
M. Stephens
J. Novembre
dcterms:description: MAPS is a method for estimating recent migration and population-size surfaces, providing insights into the dynamics of population structure and migration.
dcterms:title: MAPS (Mapping Ancestry and Population Structure)

dcterms:creator: P. Skoglund
P. Sjdin
T. Skoglund
M. Lascoux
M. Jakobsson
dcterms:description: This dataset provides genomic data from historical or ancient samples, allowing researchers to investigate population history and temporal genetic differentiation.
dcterms:title: Genomic data from historical or ancient samples
